content.prompt: A researcher claims that the life spans of dominant males are longer than the life spans of subordinate males. Based on the results of the experiment, which of the following best supports the researcherâ€™s claim?

choices.label: Dominant males have proteins in their urine that protect them from harmful genetic mutations.
Dominant males have proteins in their urine that enable them to communicate with subordinate males in their group.
Dominant males are able to move more freely throughout their territory, which gives them greater access to resources.
Dominant males are able to move more freely throughout their territory, which reduces the number of pathogens they are exposed to.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
